trigger_prototype.expression: (({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and ({Template VmBix VM Loadable Module:vm.guest.disk.free.pct[{#GUESTDISK}].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_PCT_CRITICAL} and {Template VmBix VM Loadable Module:vmbix[vm.guest.disk.free,{HOST.NAME},{#GUESTDISK}].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_CRITICAL})) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and ({Template VmBix VM Loadable Module:vm.guest.disk.free.pct[{#GUESTDISK}].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_PCT_WARNING} and {Template VmBix VM Loadable Module:vmbix[vm.guest.disk.free,{HOST.NAME},{#GUESTDISK}].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}<{$DISK_WARNING}))) and {Template VmBix VM Loadable Module:vmbix[vm.guest.disk.capacity,{HOST.NAME},{#GUESTDISK}].last({$DISK_TRIGGER_PERIOD})}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Free space on {#GUESTDISK} ({ITEM.VALUE2}/{ITEM.VALUE}) - High

trigger.name: ESX is swapping for this VM

trigger.expression: ({Template VmBix VM Loadable Module:vmbix[vm.guest.tools.running,{HOST.NAME}].max(10m)}=0) and ({Template VmBix VM Loadable Module:vmbix[vm.powerstate,{HOST.NAME}].last()}<>0)
trigger.name: VM Tools are not running
